title: Fix v2/mod.rs hardcoded model
description: Fix TODO at line 222 - model field is hardcoded to None, should extract from actual response

title: Fix v2/session.rs model extraction
description: Fix TODO at line 169 - extract model from client options

title: Fix v2/session.rs session resumption
description: Fix TODO at line 296 - implement proper session resumption from persistent storage

title: Fix types/messages.rs panics
description: Replace 15+ panics in enum accessor methods with proper error handling

title: Fix skills/dependency.rs version checking
description: Implemented proper semantic version checking using semver crate

title: Add 52_batch_operations.rs example - demonstrate batch processing patterns
description: Create example showing batch operations: processing multiple queries efficiently, parallel vs sequential batch execution, progress tracking, error handling for batch items

title: Add 53_error_recovery.rs example - demonstrate error recovery and retry patterns
description: Create example showing error recovery: retry with exponential backoff, graceful degradation, error context preservation, recovery strategies

title: Add 54_advanced_streaming.rs example - demonstrate advanced streaming patterns
description: Create example showing advanced streaming: backpressure handling, chunked responses, stream composition, real-time processing pipelines

title: Add 61_multi_modal.rs example - demonstrate comprehensive multimodal input handling
description: Create example showing multimodal: multiple images, mixed content types, image preprocessing, URL vs base64 comparison

title: Add 62_advanced_v2_api.rs example - demonstrate advanced V2 API features
description: Create example showing advanced V2: custom session handlers, streaming with V2, error handling patterns, middleware integration

title: Create partnership example - AI investment partnership demo
description: Create 63_partnership.rs demonstrating the partnership module for AI investment partnerships based on Buffett model

title: Create WASM example - WebAssembly usage demo
description: Create 64_wasm_example showing how to use SDK features in WASM context

title: Create middleware example - V2 API middleware patterns
description: Create 65_v2_middleware.rs showing V2 API with retry, logging, caching middleware

title: Create integration example - combining features
description: Create 66_full_integration.rs showing complete integration of multiple SDK features

title: Create CLI tools example - building CLI tools with SDK
description: Create 67_cli_tools.rs demonstrating building interactive CLI tools using the SDK

title: Fix compilation errors in hot_reload.rs - add missing tracing macros
description: Add use tracing::{debug, error} at top of file alongside existing info, warn imports

title: Fix compilation errors in sandbox.rs - add missing tracing macros
description: Add use tracing::{debug, info} macros in sandbox.rs for logging statements at lines 565 and 629

title: Fix Clippy warnings - unused imports and int_plus_one
description: Fix: 1) unused notify::EventKind in hot_reload.rs:70, 2) int_plus_one in parallel.rs:327,410, 3) unused std::io::Write in progressive_disclosure.rs:314

title: Consolidate Skill trait definitions
description: Two different Skill traits exist: basic in mod.rs (57-64) and extended in trait_impl.rs (10-62). Need to consolidate to single definition in trait_impl.rs and re-export from mod.rs

title: Consolidate SkillRegistry implementations
description: Two SkillRegistry structs: simple sync in mod.rs (67-276) with discovery methods, async in registry.rs (11-139) with indexing. Consolidate async version as primary, extract discovery to separate module

title: Create discovery.rs module
description: Extract discovery methods from mod.rs SkillRegistry: discover_from_dir, discover_skill_md_from_dir, discover_from_multiple_dirs into dedicated discovery.rs module

title: Fix SkillBox::clone implementation
description: Clone creates dummy skill with only name (trait_impl.rs:138-145). Remove Clone impl or make it panic/error to prevent unexpected behavior
